signers.label: Signers
signers.description: Select specific users who can sign this contract.

signer_groups.label: Signer Groups (Group IDs)
signer_groups.placeholder:
Enter Atlassian group IDs, one per line
Example: 0a89c6b3-e6dc-41af-a86b-1e012a309a30
signer_groups.description: Enter Atlassian group IDs (not team IDs), one per line. Find group IDs in Atlassian Admin.

max_signatures.label: Maximum Signatures (optional)
max_signatures.description: Maximum number of signatures allowed. Use 0 to disable signing. Leave empty for unlimited.

visibility_limit.label: Signature Display Limit (optional)
visibility_limit.description: Number of signatures to display initially. Leave empty to show all. Users can click 'Show more' to see hidden signatures.

restore.placeholder: Paste backup data here (base64 or plain SQL)...
restore.description: Paste backup data below. Accepts both base64-encoded .sql.gz content (from the textarea above) or plain SQL (from decompressed .sql.gz file).
restore.error_empty: Please paste backup data in the text area

summary.title: Restore Summary
summary.no_changes: No changes - all data already exists with the same values

delete.title: Delete All Data
delete.description: This will permanently delete ALL signature data from the database. This action is IRREVERSIBLE.
delete.warning_description: Deleting all signature data will permanently remove all contracts and signatures from the database. This action cannot be undone. Make sure you have created a backup before proceeding.
delete.confirm_message: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete ALL signature data? This will remove {contracts} contracts and {signatures} signatures permanently.

admin.backup_description: Export all signature data to a compressed SQL dump (base64-encoded .sql.gz)
